attributes.action: immediately commission a public enquiry into the death of Baby P
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Baby P's tragic murder was the result of systemic failures and under staffing within a Social Services Department. Lessons need to be learned quickly so that further deaths among vulnerable children are prevented. The British electorate whom he serves, call on Mr Brown to do the honourable thing and immediately launch a public enquiry.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
